Package com.stormpath.sdk.application.webconfig

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ApplicationWebConfig
    As ApplicationWebConfig resource is used to configure how the application associated to this object behaves in the Stormpath Client Api.
    ChangePasswordConfig  
    ForgotPasswordConfig  
    LoginConfig  
    MeConfig
    Exposes the configurable properties of the /me route.
    MeExpansionConfig
    The MeExpansionConfig belongs to a MeConfig and exposes the expandable properties of an Account returned when accessing the /me route with the proper assertion.
    Oauth2Config  
    RegisterConfig  
    VerifyEmailConfig
    VerifyEmailConfig exposes the configurable properties for email verification when creating an account through the Stormpath Client Api.
    WebFeatureConfig<T extends WebFeatureConfig<T>>
    WebFeatureConfig exposes configurable properties for WebFeatures.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ApplicationWebConfigStatus
